LanguageData.koisama.Numbers.Title: Numbers overview
LanguageData.Numbers_SetAsDefaultExplanation: Sets the currently viewed layout as the default for this type of view ({0}). This layout will then be used for new colonies. Can be deleted in the mod settings (Menu => Options => Mod settings => Numbers).
LanguageData.Numbers_NoDefaultStoredForThisView: There are no defaults stored for the currently viewed pawn type.
LanguageData.Numbers_ShowMoreInfoThanVanilla: Show needs and jobs even where it would normally be hidden.
LanguageData.Numbers_coolerThanTheWildlifeTab: Numbers is everything I ever wanted from the Wildlife tab and I want it to take over.
LanguageData.Numbers_MaxTableHeight: Max amount of vertical screen space Numbers is allowed to use.
LanguageData.Numbers_pawnTableClickSelect: Mouse clicks in pawn tables select them. (Alt-click to work as before)
LanguageData.Numbers_pawnTableHighSelected: Should behave intuitively like any other selection. Press Esc to close the tab window.\n\nShift-click to select/deselect multiple. Double click to center camera. Right-click to select a single pawn. Alt-click to close window, select and go to that one pawn.
